welcome.title: Welcome to DailyOwo
welcome.subtitle: Your journey to financial freedom starts here. Let's set up your personalized experience.

ai.title: AI-Powered
ai.description: Smart insights that help you grow

region.title: Where are you located?
region.subtitle: We'll customize your experience based on your region

preferences.title: Customize your experience
preferences.subtitle: Choose how DailyOwo works for you

offlineMode.title: Offline Mode
offlineMode.description: Use core features without internet connection

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync
cloudSync.description: Back up your data and access from any device

privacyNote.title: Privacy First
privacyNote.description: You can change these settings anytime. Your data is encrypted and never shared without your permission.

profile.title: Let's get to know you
profile.subtitle: This helps us personalize your experience
profile.ageHelper: We use this to provide age-appropriate financial advice

privacyNote.title: Your privacy matters
privacyNote.description: Your personal information is encrypted and never shared with third parties.

financialSnapshot.title: Let's understand your finances
financialSnapshot.subtitle: This helps us create your personalized plan
financialSnapshot.dontWorry: Don't worry about being exact. You can update these anytime.

family.title: Want to manage finances together?
family.subtitle: Invite family members to collaborate on your financial journey
family.description: Share financial goals, track combined net worth, and build wealth together with privacy controls.
family.name: Name

investments.title: Do you have investments to track?
investments.subtitle: We'll help you monitor your portfolio performance
investments.description: Track all your investments in one place and see your true net worth grow over time.
investments.selectAll: Select all that apply (you can add details later)
investments.dontWorry: Don't worry about exact values now. You can add specific investments and their current values after setup.

completion.title: Perfect, {firstName}!
completion.subtitle: Your personalized financial dashboard is ready. Let's start building your path to financial freedom.

aiReady.title: Your AI Advisor is ready
aiReady.description: I'll analyze your financial patterns and provide personalized insights to help you reach your goals faster.

completion.canChangeSettings: You can always update your settings later
completion.settingUp: Setting up your personalized financial hub

install.title: Install DailyOwo
install.androidDescription: Install our app for quick access and offline support.
install.iosDescription: Tap the share button and "Add to Home Screen" for the best experience.

iosInstructions.step2: Scroll and tap "Add to Home Screen"

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to access this
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again
